name: PHILADELPHIA GAS WORKS to the Use of the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Philadelphia Gas Works ex rel. City of Philadelphia v. Commonwealth, Board of Finance & Revenue

parties: PHILADELPHIA GAS WORKS to the Use of the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 22 nd day of August, 2000, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
757 A.2d 360
PHILADELPHIA GAS WORKS to the Use of the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 22, 2000.
